name: Hyfo
body:
Welcome to hyfo easy start, hyfo is an R package which can be used as a tool for hydrological and forecasting. There are several tools in R including data processing and data visualization. For hydrological and hydraulic modellers, hyfo can be a good preprocessing and postprocessing tool for you.


Detailed user manual can be found as following:

pdf version [here](http://media.wix.com/ugd/199c69_b5a335b6b95840e39ce2a22b55393d48.pdf)

html version [here](http://rpubs.com/rankthefirst/hyfo)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
